name: Dupre
description: print("a ruggedly handsome man, wearing a gleaming suit of armor.\n*")

69: print("\"It's Dupre - sounds like dew pray, remember?\"")
print("\"Why, questing, of course! We've been on many a @quest together, you and I.\"")
print("\"Yes, you've gone on some really fine ones.\"\n*\n\"When you're not around I have to settle for rescuing @damsels, finding @grails, and the like.\"")
print("\"It could be worse.\"\n*\n\"Some of them are pretty eager to show their @gratitude, if you know what I mean...\"")
print("\"Wink wink, nudge nudge, say no more...\"")
print("\"That's right.\"\n*\n\"Lord British likes to keep grails around to use at his @banquets, but he's always losing them.\"")
print("\"He'll throw us a fine feast if you can deal with the @gargoyle invasion somehow.\"")
print("\"They may be the toughest threat we've ever faced.")
print("\"I've been with you since the start of this quest, haven't I?\"")
print("\"Lord British gave me strict orders not to leave your side until this quest is complete.\"\n*\n\"Besides, you know how I hate to miss a good quest.\"")
print("\"Please, let's not talk about ducks...\"")
print("\"Yes, enough chit chat. Let's go find some action!\"\n")
